text: "Best Thing I Never Had" is a 2011 song by Beyoncé and is the second single from her fourth studio album 4. It went to number 1 in Croatia and South Korea and went to the top 30 in Australia, Brazil, Canada, Czech Republic, Denmark, Germany, Ireland, Israel, Japan, New Zealand, Portugal, Scotland, Slovakia, South Africa, the United Kingdom, and the United States. The song is likened to the Vanessa Carlton song A Thousand Miles. It charted poorly in France where it made number 61. ==Formats and track listings== *;Digital download #"Best Thing I Never Had" – 4:12 *;German CD single #"Best Thing I Never Had" – 4:13 #"Run the World (Girls)" (Kaskade Club Remix) – 5:03 *;Digital Remixes EP #"Best Thing I Never Had" (Gareth Wyn Remix) – 6:33 #"Best Thing I Never Had" (Olli Collins & Fred Portelli Remix) – 6:23 #"Best Thing I Never Had" (Billionaire Remix) – 4:40 #"Best Thing I Never Had" (Moguai Remix) – 6:17 ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Best Thing I Never Had
